short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to consciously decide the time you spend on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to 
- Add up to 20 distracting websites.

- Choose the amount of time you want to spend on a webpage, or even choose not to visit it at all.

The extension doesn't block any webpages, it just tries to make you aware of the time you spend on them.

It's a simple tool that hopefully allows you to take back control of the time you spend on the web.
